Myths & Facts About COVID-19 Vaccines
What to know
Getting a COVID-19 vaccine is a safer and more dependable way to build immunity to COVID-19 than getting sick with COVID-19.
COVID-19 vaccination causes a more predictable immune response than an infection with the virus that causes COVID-19.
FACT: COVID-19 vaccination causes a more predictable immune response than an infection with the virus that causes COVID-19.
